subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: U.C.L.A. guard Darren Collison, whose parents were world-class sprinters from Guyana, may be the only Bruin who can keep up with the up-tempo Kansas Jayhawks.
snippet: U.C.L.A. guard Darren Collison, whose parents were world-class sprinters from Guyana, may be the only Bruin who can keep up with the up-tempo Kansas Jayhawks.
